sn7.8:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn7.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aggikabharadvajassa brahmanassa sappina payaso sannihito hoti:
sn7.8:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagaham pindaya pavisi.
sn7.8:2.2: Rajagahe sapadanam pindaya caramano yena aggikabharadvajassa brahmanassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi.
sn7.8:2.3: Addasa kho aggikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam pindaya thitam.
sn7.8:10.1: Evam vutte, aggikabharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.8:10.3: annataro ca panayasma aggikabharadvajo arahatam ahositi.
